It'd be better to add auto-wrapping of Tensors, that would automatically promote them to Variables (so op(var, tensor) is equivalent to op(var, Variable(tensor))).

body: I think it's better to keep them separate - you have a tensor library supporting different kinds of devices + autograd on top, for the functions you want to differentiate. It'd be better to add auto-wrapping of Tensors, that would automatically promote them to Variables (so `op(var, tensor)` is equivalent to `op(var, Variable(tensor))`).
